title: i dnt know what happened i bought the old pixel xl(renewed) but after 1week my phone get damaged plz
content:
i bought the phone from an olx user with money that my father gave to me he said to me twice that dont buy 2nd phones but i think its pixel wow so i bought it but after the next week the phone got damaged.the charging port is not working and service centres said we couldnt do anything so now i dont have phone only because i selected pixel.my father wont give me money for a new phone what will i do now.actully i didnt say to him because i dont know what to say google plz help me.i think your are the only who can help me.if you give a phone instead i will give its money back when i will get job this an assurance from me please help.
673604
